Reba Godfrey

Reba Godfrey, District 5

2022 to 2026 Email Reba Godfrey

Reba Godfrey is a life-long resident of District 5. She attended Pemberton Sr. High School and graduated from Marshall High in 1971. She graduated Summa Cum Laude from Wiley College in 1975 with a Bachelor of Science degree in Elementary Education and a minor in English. In 1980, she graduated Summa Cum Laude from Prairie View A&M University with a Master of Education degree. She married her 12th grade sweetheart, Willard Godfrey, in 1975. They are the parents of a daughter & son.

Mrs. Godfrey worked 36 years as an elementary teacher before retiring in August 2012. Â She and her husband resided in Tulsa, OK, where she taught for one year. Beginning in 2007, she was honored to work several years with K-12 students of Marshall as a Wiley College NASA SEMAA teacher.
